trends: There have been no other sightings in Spring Grove
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Two lights coming at me that look like head lights 4 red tail light looking lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsI awoke at 3pm to use the bathroom as I walked back towards my bed that is near a window I saw two big lights comming toward that window, I walked over to the patio doors and all I could see was the two big ligts just above the tree lines as it went past I could then see the big red tail light there appeared to be 4 of them, there was no sound comming from this obeject at all, it was a cloudy night and I could not see any shape the lights were very bright, I strained to see anything I possilby could but just could not make out a shape, it did not move very fast just sorted glided across the side road and over a little building across the street then it went behind some trees and I could not see it anymore. I felt scared I have never seen anyting fly that low before with no noise, I have seen airplanes in the sky and heard them and this was no airplane. The last few nights when going to bed I get scared, The lights were just to big and the object flew lower than any airplane would. I was to stunned to even think about getting any pictures, I just stood and watched it.
